彩.definition: (bright) color; variety; applause; applaud; lottery prize

彩䴉.definition: (bird species of China) glossy ibis (Plegadis falcinellus)

彩印.definition: color printing; abbr. for 彩色印刷[cai3 se4 yin4 shua1]

彩卷.definition: color film; abbr. for 彩色膠卷|彩色胶卷; lottery ticket

彩排.definition: dress rehearsal; to have a dress rehearsal

彩擴.definition: to enlarge color photos; color film processing

彩色筆.definition: colored pencil (or crayon or marker etc); (Tw) color marker

彩虹吸蜜鸚鵡.pinyin: cǎi hóng xī mì yīng wǔ
彩虹吸蜜鸚鵡.definition: (bird species of China) rainbow lorikeet (Trichoglossus moluccanus)

彩虹旗.definition: rainbow flag, aka LGBT pride flag

彩虹蜂虎.definition: (bird species of China) rainbow bee-eater (Merops ornatus)

彩虹行動.definition: the two mass scuttling operations carried out by the German navy: the scuttling of the German fleet at Scapa Flow in 1919 and Operation Regenbogen, the scuttling of U-boats in 1945

彩虹鸚鵡.definition: (bird species of China) coconut lorikeet (Trichoglossus haematodus)

彩蛋.definition: painted eggshell; Easter egg; (media) Easter egg (hidden feature in software or a movie etc); post-credits scene

彩頭.definition: good omen; good luck (in business etc); profits (gained in gambling, lottery etc)

彩鷸.definition: (bird species of China) greater painted-snipe (Rostratula benghalensis)

彩鸛.definition: (bird species of China) painted stork (Mycteria leucocephala)
